titleStmt.title: The great case of liberty of conscience once more briefly debated & defended ... which may serve the place of a general reply to such late discourses as have oppos'd a tolleration / the authour W.P.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Written by William Penn. Cf. BM.
